q1: Can Jurgen Klopp lead Liverpool to a Premier League championship?
a1: No way can he do that alone
a2: He IS the best Team Manager in the world! look what he have done with the BVB and LFC so far
q3: Klopp is certainly and exciting and charismatic figure who has the respect of fans and players alike.
a3: Liverpool has Mohamed Saleh to lead them to wins and the championship.
q4: But do they stand a chance against teams like Barcelona with Messi or Paris with Neymar?
a4: On a good day they can beat anyone. Problem is consistency, how many times last year did they beat the best yet fail to get results on lesser teams?
